Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows a water and light show in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, when in reality it is a video of an ancient war-themed water show in Fuyang, Anhui, China.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based solely on a viral video with a caption, without providing any additional evidence or sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is of a water fountain show in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, without verifying its authenticity or sources.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video is actually of an ancient war-themed water show in Fuyang, Anhui, China, as confirmed by the Chinese fact-check report and the statement from Hangzhou police.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the availability and cost of the water and light show in Jodhpur, stating that the entrance fee is Rs.3,000 per head, when in reality it is a false claim.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting false information about the location and nature of the water and light show.
